perks.title: Black Widow/Lady Killer

perks.title: Cherchez La Femme/Confirmed Bachelor

perks.title: Friend of the Night
perks.description: Your eyes adapt quickly to low-light conditions.

perks.title: Heave, Ho!

perks.title: Fortune Finder

perks.title: Hand Loader

perks.title: Lead Belly

perks.title: Shotgun Surgeon

perks.title: The Professional

perks.title: Toughness

perks.title: Vigilant Recycler

perks.title: Commando

perks.title: Cowboy

perks.title: Scrounger
perks.description: Considerably more ammunition in stockpiles.

perks.title: Strong Back

perks.title: Here and Now

perks.title: Finesse
perks.description: +5% Critical Chance.

perks.title: Mister Sandman

perks.title: Mysterious Stranger

perks.title: Nerd Rage!
perks.description: +15 DT and Strength increased to 10 whenever health is 20% or lower.

skill: +15 points to that skill.
